attributes.title: Biden 2020

attributes.review: This is the worst app in the planet. I got it to see what trump was up to and it kept crashing and kicking me out of the app. It deleted everything off of my phone, luckily I had backed it up but DONT GET IT. Trump is super annoying and I wouldn’t recommend this app unless you want to crash your phone every 20 minutes. TIKTOK IS SUPERIOR. Trump is really stupid for trying to ban an overly used app that many have found happiness with it. ✨Trump 2020🤪✨ No❤️ just no
attributes.title: I hate it❤️

attributes.review: my dog ate my other dogs head. i know the reason for this is because of this app.
attributes.title: my poor dogs

attributes.review: i am enraged that my president would make something so terrible. i really hoped that this app would live up to my true american dreams but sadly it does not. first it wouldn’t open and froze my phone. when it opened it asked for my phone number and of course since i’m a true american that bows down to my president i handed it over. next thing i knew i got a random phone call. i answers it and you wouldn’t believe who called me. it was PRESIDENT TRUMP HIMSELF! i was shocked at first but then he said “you aren’t a true american” then he hung up the phone. right after he hung up there was a knock at my door. i opened it and TRUMP WAS STANDING RIGHT THERE! i was so happy and immediately got down on the ground to kiss his shoes. he told me that i wasn’t american enough for his liking and insisted that he eats my kneecaps. i told him that they were reserved for my sister but he tells me no. he takes my kneecaps. they are gone now. mr trump please give me back my kneecaps. i want them back. please. 🇺🇸
attributes.title: oh no

attributes.title: heyy bunker boy 🌸✨🧚

attributes.review: It took ages to download. (TWO WEEKS?!) all of my photos were deleted and the second I entered the app my phone died even though it was plugged in. I don’t know why they made this so bad. They made it too easy for us to write bad reviews.
attributes.title: This app was horrible
